field.name: description
field.value:
I haven't actually checked the code to make sure this isn't already in, so please forgive me if it is.
see: http://api.rubyonrails.com/classes/ActionController/AutoComplete/ClassMethods.html http://api.rubyonrails.com/classes/ActionView/Helpers/JavaScriptHelper.html
This feature was just requested by our users (not Castle), but our framework (not Castle) doesn't support it. It would be great for evangelizing Castle if it were already in there.
